captions.text: Do you wanna see the future!
You're here because of me, Vishnu.
I made the company what it is.

...there's a whole
new world outside JDC.

Do something which
makes the world go...

But coming back to compete is
a bigger mistake.

comments.text:
saw the movie...nice take on a hollywood project...after seeing some 
comments i guess the people on here can only think of step up when infact 
its just a nice spiced up inspired story from a movie called " stomp the 
yard" check it out for yourself...only diff is that its a dance off between 
two fraternities , the lead guy's brother dies in an accident of sorts and 
inspires him to do better and one frat copies of the other in the 
finals...but nonetheless..ABCD was a very well done movie...
